sources.name: CO2 emissions by source (CDIAC)
sources.description:
Data published by CDIAC
Data publisher's source
Linkhttp://cdiac.ornl.gov/trends/emis/tre_coun.html
Retrieved25/4/2016

Additional information

China only refers to Mainland China; France is including Monaco.

As in the original source (CDIAC), emissions from bunker fuels are not included in these totals.
